installCommand.linux: command -v bun >/dev/null 2>&1 || (curl -fsSL https://bun.sh/install | bash); export PATH="$HOME/.bun/bin:$PATH"; npm install --production --no-save --silent --no-audit --no-fund || true
installCommand.macos: command -v bun >/dev/null 2>&1 || (curl -fsSL https://bun.sh/install | bash); export PATH="$HOME/.bun/bin:$PATH"; npm install --production --no-save --silent --no-audit --no-fund || true
installCommand.windows: where bun >nul 2>&1 || powershell -c "irm bun.sh/install.ps1 | iex"; $env:PATH += ";$env:USERPROFILE\.bun\bin"; npm install --production --no-save --silent --no-audit --no-fund || true
